Hello

Hello

We are a team of Kent and London based wedding photographers and videographers, working together to create beautiful, honest and timeless wedding photos and videos for couples.

Instinct Wedding was founded in 2017 by Justina and Lloyd, a husband and wife, who are the main shooters and visionnaires in the company. Whether you book photography, video or joint package, you will always have one of us on the day.

We both have background in Fine Art, and having worked and experimented with many art mediums and techniques, we fell in love with photography and video and the ability to capture memories for generations to remember.

On the wedding day, whether we are doing photography, video or both, we try and stay discreet, positive, helpful and most importantly concentrating on capturing all the beautiful moments, emotions, events as they unfold.

We are based in Kent and are happy to cover your beautiful wedding anywhere in UK or Europe - get in touch!

When we are not working, we love spending time with our family (we have two beautiful daughters), travelling, going for long walks in nature, road tripping and discovering heritage villages.

Get in touch

Prices

Photography

£ 1350

  • Wedding Photographer on your day for 8 hours
  • An in-depth consultation where we can get to know each other (in person or over email).
  • An online gallery with 400-600 edited photos from your day
  • Beautiful personalised USB stick

Videography

£ 1350

  • Wedding Videographer on the day for 8 hours
  • An in-depth consultation where we can get to know each other (in person or over email).
  • A Cinematic 5 - 10 minute Highlight Film
  • Online link to share with family and friends
  • Beautiful personalised USB stick

Photography & Videography

£ 2350

  • 8 Hours of Coverage for both Photography and Video
  • One Photographer
  • One Videographer
  • A Cinematic 5 - 10 minute Highlight Film
  • Professionally edited photos in the online gallery
  • Personalised USB stick

A la Carte Extras

  • Engagement Session
  • 25 - 35 Minute Feature Film
  • Ceremony and Speeches in Full
  • Additional Hour of Coverage

  • £250

Kind Words

“Justina and Lloyd are simply amazing. They captured our wedding day perfectly, we are so pleased with our beautiful pictures and video. From the moment we met them, we loved them. They were so professional, friendly and helped calmed both our nerves before and on the day. We are rather shy people who had never had any professionals photos taken before so felt rather awkward in front of the camera however, Justina really put us at ease and the photos and video prove how talented they are.”

Kit, the Bride

“Lloyd filmed our wedding in May 2019. the quality of the filming and editing was fantastic. He did an excellent job of capturing our day and made us feel really comfortable. The presentation box the usb came in was beautiful and we will treasure the video he created forever.”

Rosie, the Bride

“I dont think I can put into words how incredible Justina and Lloyd were with my wedding photography and videography. I spent weeks looking through websites and portfolios as its the one thing with our wedding we knew we wanted to be perfect and what a decision we made to go with instinct weddings. They were amazing from start to finish, getting up early to picture and film my husband then make their way to myself and the bridal team.. they got everything we asked whilst remaining professional and an absolute joy to be around. They made us feel totally at ease and when we got back our photos and videos we experienced the whole day all over again. I cannot recommend them enough, they are a team worth booking” :)

Louise, the Bride

“We used Instinct Wedding for our wedding video in May. Justina made the planning so stress free by her kind, friendly and professional manner. Lloyd was brilliant on the day too. When the video arrIved we were blown away!! It was absolutely beautiful and made me cry! We can’t thank Instinct Wedding enough for helping us have these memories to keep forever!”

Lisa, the Bride
